description: Among the things associated with the&nbsp;Christmas season is eggnog. This delicious holiday drink is always a hit, but it can be better. Fireball eggnog is a fun twist on the classic recipe that's sure to become a new favorite.The popular cinnamon whiskey incorporates a touch of warm spice and a little bit of sweetness to the&nbsp;eggnog. And the rich aroma is sure to put everyone in a festive mood. You won't regret trying this. Share it with your friends and family during the holidays!
name: Fireball Eggnog

recipeInstructions.name: Mix the sugar and ground cinnamon on a plate.
recipeInstructions.text: Mix the sugar and ground cinnamon on a plate.

recipeInstructions.name: Pour water on a separate plate and dip the rim of a rocks glass into it, then into the sugar-cinnamon mixture. Set aside.
recipeInstructions.text: Pour water on a separate plate and dip the rim of a rocks glass into it, then into the sugar-cinnamon mixture. Set aside.

recipeInstructions.name: Get a shaker, fill it with ice, and add the Fireball, eggnog, and vodka.
recipeInstructions.text: Get a shaker, fill it with ice, and add the Fireball, eggnog, and vodka.

recipeInstructions.name: Cover the glass and shake it with vigor for approximately 10 seconds.
recipeInstructions.text: Cover the glass and shake it with vigor for approximately 10 seconds.

recipeInstructions.name: Strain and pour the mixture into the prepared glass.
recipeInstructions.text: Strain and pour the mixture into the prepared glass.

recipeInstructions.name: Stick a cinnamon stick into the drink.
recipeInstructions.text: Stick a cinnamon stick into the drink.

recipeInstructions.name: Grate the nutmeg over the drink. Enjoy!
recipeInstructions.text: Grate the nutmeg over the drink. Enjoy!
